DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of the IDEAL IMPLANT in women who are undergoing primary breast augmentation or replacement of existing saline-filled or silicone gel-filled augmentation implants.
DOC.brief_title: Core Study of the Safety and Effectiveness of IDEAL IMPLANT(R) Saline-filled Breast Implants
DOC.detailed_description: For complete information about the clinical trial, see link in the reference section.
DOC.criteria: Bilateral primary breast augmentationdissatisfaction with breast size Bilateral replacement augmentationhas had previous silicone salinefilled or gelfilled breast implants Diagnosis of active cancer of any type Has ever been diagnosed with breast cancer Has premalignant breast disease Has tissue characteristics incompatible with an implant Has unrealistic or unreasonable expectations of the procedure results
